title: PHP Developer | 2+ Years | Mohali | Work from office only
Associate Software Developer
description/Eligibilit/0: Bachelor's degree in Engineering without any backlogs.

description/Responsibilitie/0: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement high-quality software solutions.
description/Responsibilitie/1: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code using best practices in software development.
description/Responsibilitie/2: Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, implementation, testing, and deployment.
description/Responsibilitie/3: Participate in code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards and to improve the overall quality of the codebase.
description/Responsibilitie/4: Debug and resolve software defects and issues, working closely with the quality assurance team.
description/Responsibilitie/5: Continuously update technical knowledge and skills by attending workshops, reading industry publications, and participating in professional associations.
description/Responsibilitie/6: Communicate effectively with team members, managers, and other stakeholders to ensure project goals are met and expectations are clear.
description/Skills Require/0: Strong foundation in programming concepts and data structures, with proficiency in at least one programming language (e.g., Java, C++, C#, or JavaScript).
description/Skills Require/1: Familiarity with object-oriented programming, design patterns, and software development best practices
description/Skills Require/2: Basic understanding of web development technologies, such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
description/Skills Require/3: Knowledge of databases, including SQL and NoSQL, and experience with database design is desirable.
description/Skills Require/4: Exposure to version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Trello, or Confluence).
description/Skills Require/5: A passion for technology and a genuine interest in the software development process.
description/Skills Require/6: Knowledge of Golang, Rust, any JavaScript frameworks like React, Next, Express/Node/Nest, etc is a plus.
description/Skills Require/7: Any prior blockchain related development/ internship is a plus.
